doc.field: Strikes, Demonstrations, and Parades: 5/81 strike against the New York Times; 6/12/82 anti-nuclear demonstration at United Nations; 9/7/81 Labor Day Parade—Fifth Avenue—Times Unit [of the Newspaper Guild—Local 3]; c. 1982, Local 3 participation in Washington [DC] march, possibly Equal Rights Amendment support
